meta.blockReceivedLagNotificationDelay: Delay after which notification for lagging network will be sent in seconds
meta.noBlocksReceivedNotificationDelay: Delay after which notification for no blocks received will be sent in seconds
meta.notFinalizingNotificationDelay: Delay after which notification for blocks not being finalized will be sent
meta.emailNotifications: Turn email notifications on or off
meta.serverPort: Port used to run server app
meta.webHooks: Array of urls which should be pinged when notification event occurs
meta.maxDataAge: Maximum age for blocks stored in database, in hours
meta.validatorId: Id of the validator to follow
